title: Yasuo Vs Master Yi
body: Since they're both crit users and are OP i was wondering who would win in a 1v1

replies.body: it would be a two second fight decided on master yi's q timing

OP?

Yi is OP?

Neh.

Yasuo was OP then he kinda wasn't and I don't really know now.

I would definitely have to say yi as there is no way yasuo can live long enough to build stacks on his q to ult and he can dodge the tornado with alpha strike. but if yas were able to build stacks on nearby minions and kite and land a knock-up ult on yi then yasuo. but who can kite a yi with ghostblade/ult/ghost (i like to use ghost sometimes) moving at 600+ movespeed.
